text: Abateshele balia nibaboolela balia abelola abakhongo, mbu: “Halali mwakholanga ebifwanga eshitere nende eshilo, olwa mwakhulomesinjia okhukhaya Nyasaye nende okhumukholela Abasanji.” Nabo balichisa okhwiyitsulisia olwabalilola eshinyasio, ni khulira ominyororo mumakosi kabalia bakhaya. Shibarungungwa akandi tawe halali kabo bakholanga
